column1: # Description: These EPA data files come from the old GCAM3 system (they were in nonco2/Input Data/EPA National Inventories). The documentation there is limited. For example
column2: the CO file says: "National Emissions Trends -- updated 7/18/2005. Carbon Monoxide Emissions (thousand short tons)."
